{"id":1526720605,"question_id":3651,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"6 days, 22 hours","timestamp":1738349154,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"9 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1526720605/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Transformed Array","memory":"25.8 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    vector<int> constructTransformedArray(vector<int>& nums) {\n        int n = nums.size();\n        vector<int> res(n, 0);\n        for(int i=0; i<n; i++) {\n            if(nums[i]==0)\n                res[i] = nums[i];\n            else if(nums[i]>0) {\n                int steps = nums[i]%n;\n                int idx = (i+steps)%n;\n                res[i] = nums[idx];\n            } else if(nums[i]<0) {\n                int steps = abs(nums[i])%n;\n                int idx = (i-steps+n)%n;\n                res[i] = nums[idx];  \n            }\n        };\n        return res;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"transformed-array","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
